mvc.config.enable_merging.desc: When enabled, multiple resource packs that modify the same vanilla item will have their custom item textures (CIT) and model predicates merged together. This allows for a more diverse and customizable experience when using multiple resource packs.
mvc.config.enable_pack_crash_fix.desc: When enabled, this option fixes crashes that occur when resource packs modify vanilla items. This ensures a smoother experience when using resource packs that alter item appearances or behaviors.
